subject: Re: About the value of JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Not I.  But to be clear: I *DON T* think that spending large portions of time testing is *BAD*. -- PC Paul Christmann Prior Artisans, LLC
messageBody:
javainsel wrote:
> If testing time is so high, then who wants to blame me for looking
> for Parasoft JTest to make testing more productive?

Not I. But to be clear: I *DON'T* think that spending large portions of
time testing is *BAD*.

--
PC

Paul Christmann
